member.name: P:Tundra.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Tundra.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Tundra.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:Tundra.ExtendedRichTextBox.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the text colors, creates dictionaries for RTF colors and font families, and stores the horizontal and vertical resolution of the RichTextBox's graphics context.

member.name: T:Tundra.ExtendedRichTextBox
member.summary: The rich text box print control class was developed by Microsoft, information about this control can be found in your help files at: ms-help://MS.VSCC.v80/MS.MSDN.v80/MS.KB.v10.en/enu_kbvbnetkb/vbnetkb/811401.htm In general, their intent was to create a rich text box control with print capability embedded into the control.
member.remarks: This control class replaces the use of the regular RichTextBox control; the purpose of this extension was specifically to facilitate printing the contents of a rich text box control.
